column4: Hello! I have one problem with Ubuntu 6.10: I can't make the TV tuner work. I've installed tvtime, but all I see is a blue screen with a "No Signal" message on it, no matter what settings I change in the menu. Is there something I can do to make it work properly?
is it plugged in to the aerial/cable/etc connection
(thats just one thing that would explain why no signal ...)
yes, and I know for shure it works in "Windows"
